job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an enthusiastic colleague that will help us shape the future of Conversational AI at ABN AMRO in the role of an engineering who can maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows by automating the data and ml processes used within the team to improve solutions like Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR (Voicebot) and LLM-based Advisor Assist.

Your job

   Thousands of customers interact with ABN AMRO on a weekly basis. We want to make sure that these conversations are getting resolved in an effective and friction free manner.

   Here at Team Advanced Conversational Engagement, part of the Customer Interaction Domain, we maintain and innovate on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling.

   In the Cognition team we are responsible for maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our conversational solutions to ensure they meet evolving customer needs and industry standards.

   Subjects you might be working on include: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows, implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts, implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms, design how we store and manually annotate data etc.

   Most recently we are in a middle of a massive migration from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot while attempting to empower our solutions with LLMs in a manner that is responsible, secure and reliable within the standards of ABN AMRO.

Working environment

   You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team of data scientists, engineers and consultants.

   In the extended team (~50 colleagues) you will be working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers.
job_details.full_text:
Backend Engineer

We are looking for an enthusiastic colleague that will help us shape the future of Conversational AI at ABN AMRO in the role of an engineering who can maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows by automating the data and ml processes used within the team to improve solutions like Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR (Voicebot) and LLM-based Advisor Assist.

Your job

   Thousands of customers interact with ABN AMRO on a weekly basis. We want to make sure that these conversations are getting resolved in an effective and friction free manner.

   Here at Team Advanced Conversational Engagement, part of the Customer Interaction Domain, we maintain and innovate on top of our conversational bot, Interactive voice response (IVR), and internal Advisor Assist tooling.

   In the Cognition team we are responsible for maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our conversational solutions to ensure they meet evolving customer needs and industry standards.

   Subjects you might be working on include: Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows, implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts, implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms, design how we store and manually annotate data etc.

   Most recently we are in a middle of a massive migration from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot while attempting to empower our solutions with LLMs in a manner that is responsible, secure and reliable within the standards of ABN AMRO.

Working environment

   You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team of data scientists, engineers and consultants.

   In the extended team (~50 colleagues) you will be working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Conversational AI, LLMs, Chatbots, and Voicebots, aligning with the core focus of a GenAI Engineer. The mention of RAG systems (implied by 'evaluating LLM prompts' and 'data architecture for analyses workflows'), fine-tuning (implied by 'enhancing' and 'innovating' solutions), and building production-grade systems ('maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows') further supports this classification.

phrases: automating the data and ml processes
implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts
implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms
empower our solutions with LLMs
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the creation, evaluation, and adaptation of machine learning and generative models, including LLMs and classification algorithms.

phrases: maintain and improve our Conversational AI workflows
maintain and innovate on top of our conversational bot
maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our conversational solutions
design how we store and manually annotate data
massive migration from a major cloud based conversational AI platform to MS Copilot
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the development and maintenance of user-facing applications and systems, including chatbots, IVRs, and advisor assist tools, as well as the integration of new platforms and LLMs.

phrases: automating the data and ml processes
implementing pipelines to evaluate LLM prompts
implementing pipelines to evaluate classification algorithms
Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows
job_tasks.justification: The mention of automating processes, setting up data architectures, and implementing pipelines for evaluation points to the operational aspects of deploying and managing AI systems.

phrases: automating the data and ml processes
Setting up a medallion data architecture for analyses workflows
design how we store and manually annotate data
job_tasks.justification: These phrases relate to the infrastructure and processes for handling data, including architecture setup and data annotation, which are key components of data engineering.

phrases: shape the future of Conversational AI
resolve in an effective and friction free manner
meet evolving customer needs and industry standards
job_tasks.justification: These phrases demonstrate an understanding of the business goals, customer experience, and market standards that the AI solutions are intended to serve.

working alongside data engineers, user experience designers, content writers and front- and backend developers
